\textbf{\field{forestMeasurement}} & number (≥0) & Forestmeasurement field value \\
\textbf{\field{millMeasurement}} & number (≥0) & Millmeasurement field value \\
\textbf{\field{reconciliationDate}} & string (date-time) & Reconciliationdate field value \\

\textbf{\field{reconciliationStatus}} & enum(4 values) & Reconciliation status with standard values \\
\textbf{\field{traceableUnitId}} & string (pattern) & Foreign key to TraceableUnit entity being reconciled \\
\field{discrepancyReason} & string & Discrepancyreason field value \\
\field{lastUpdated} & string (date-time) & Timestamp of the most recent data update \\
\field{reconciliationOperator} & string & Reconciliationoperator field value \\
\field{resolutionNotes} & string & Resolutionnotes field value \\
\field{speciesDiscrepancies} & array<string> & Array of speciesdiscrepancies values \\
